title: Bug: StrokeDashArray property only applied to first element on page
body: When the StrokeDashArray property is defined as a Setter in a XAML Style, it is only applied to the first element on the page to use that Style. Other elements on the page ignore the StrokeDashArray property as defined in the Style.

comments.body: I also have this issue. It makes it impossible to set StrokeDashArray as part of a style (assuming the style will be used more than once), which is quite annoying. It's quite a strange bug and perhaps indicates some deeper problem.
